mapper.select: select * from users where nickName = #{nickName} and email = #{email} limit 1;
select count(*) from users where ${search} like concat("%",#{searchString},"%");
select count(*) as recentLog from user_log where userId=#{userId} and loginTime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR);
mapper.insert: insert into users (userId, userPwd, nickName, name, email) values (#{userId},#{userPwd},#{nickName},#{nickName},#{email});
mapper.update: update users set userPwd=#{userPwd} where userId=#{userId};
update users set level=99 and userStatus='off' where userId=#{userId}; insert into delete_users values (default, #{userId}, #{email}, default, #{deleteReason});
